text: Sasha Enters Life () is a 1956 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Schweitzer.ТУГОЙ УЗЕЛ It stars Oleg Tabakov, Viktor Avdyushko, and Nikolai Sergeyev. == Actors == * Oleg Tabakov as Sasha Komelev * Viktor Avdyushko as Pavel Mansurov * Nikolai Sergeyev as Ignat Gmyzin * Ivan Pereverzev as Party Leader * Vladimir Yemelyanov as Party Leader == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1956 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Schweitzer
title: Sasha Enters Life
